summary: King Crimson was an English rock band formed in 1968, led by guitarist Robert Fripp. They mixed many music styles, like classical, jazz, and metal, and influenced other bands. Their first album, "In the Court of the Crimson King," was their biggest hit. The band changed members and sounds over the years, breaking up in 1974. They reunited several times, trying new music and touring. In 2021, they played their last show.
title: King Crimson
